授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to understand the objectives, components, and item characteristics of TOEIC and learn fast-talking strategies for maximizing their scores.
到達目標:
You will be able to:
1. be accustomed to the test patterns and effectively manage time to maximize their scores,
2. build their vocabulary and review grammar rules so that they can improve their fluency and accuracy when taking the test.
3. share some learning strategies and materials in a form of group presentations.
授業方法:
- During the online period: No class on April 15; from April 22, zoom real-time sessions will be conducted at the class time until in-person class is available again. These zoom sessions will be recorded and uploaded on OneDrive. More details will be given via LUNA.
- For the students permitted to take class online during the in-person period: You will participate in the within-class zoom real-time sessions.
